brand_identity.name: TimeFlow
brand_identity.emotional_tone: The calm of a perfectly organized schedule. Professional, Efficient, Trustworthy but Modern.
brand_identity.archetype: The Performance Pro meets The Swiss Architect.

weights.headings: 700 (Bold) or 800 (ExtraBold) for Hero, 600 (SemiBold) for UI headers

colors.strategy: High Contrast Utility with Vibrant 'Pulse' Accents. No gradients for backgrounds, only for 'active' borders or micro-interactions.

primary.name: Obsidian Flow
primary.description: The structural anchor. Deep slate for text in light mode, off-white for text in dark mode.

brand.name: Electric Coral
brand.description: PRIMARY CTA COLOR. Use sparingy. High energy, distinct from generic blue/purple SaaS.

secondary.name: Stone Neutral
secondary.description: Backgrounds for sidebars, cards, and secondary areas.

accent.name: Signal Volt
accent.description: Use ONLY for information/active states, not for main CTAs.

borders.dashboard: 1px solid var(--border) with 'Grid Border' strategy (visible separators).

textures.noise: Add a subtle 3% noise overlay to the dashboard background to kill digital flatness.

landing_page.grid: Bento Grid (Mode A). Asymmetrical 'Tetris' layout for features.
landing_page.hero: Split screen or Central focus with 'Tracing Beam' highlight.
landing_page.spacing: Generous. py-24 or py-32 for sections.

dashboard.grid: High Density Grid (Mode B). 100% width/height utilization.
dashboard.sidebar: Fixed width (64px collapsed / 240px expanded), high contrast border-r.
dashboard.spacing: Tight but breathable. p-6 for containers, gap-4 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-brand text-brand-foreground hover:bg-brand-hover shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

motion_library.landing: Framer Motion. Use 'AnimatePresence' for tab switching. Parallax on Hero.
motion_library.dashboard: CSS Transitions for hover states. Minimal layout shift.

instructions_to_main_agent.1: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use simple, stroke-based icons.
instructions_to_main_agent.2: Setup 'next-themes' or similar for Dark/Light mode toggle immediately.
instructions_to_main_agent.3: Implement the 'Grid Border' layout for the dashboard. Use border-r and border-b on grid items to create the visible grid.
instructions_to_main_agent.4: Use 'Manrope' font for all numbers and headings. It makes data readable.
instructions_to_main_agent.5: For the Landing Page, use the 'Bento' grid layout. Don't stack everything vertically.
instructions_to_main_agent.6: Use the specified 'Electric Coral' (#FF5533) for the main 'Book Now' or 'Create Account' buttons. Do not use Blue.
instructions_to_main_agent.7: Ensure all inputs have a 'data-testid' for testing.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: No gradients on backgrounds. Flat, high contrast, or subtle noise only.
No center-aligned text blocks longer than 3 lines.
Always use 'gap-4' or 'gap-6' in flex/grid containers.
Dark mode must be 'Slate-950' or 'Zinc-950', not pure black.
Interactive elements must have a visible ':focus-visible' ring.
